EmailTemplate.name: 2016 HUMS ANAC STCs Brazil.2016 HUMS ANAC STCs Brazil Portuguese
EmailTemplate.subject: O VXP Embarcado da Honeywell agora está disponível para os modelos Bell 206L e Airbus H145 no Brasil
EmailTemplate.textOnly: View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.honeywellaidc.com/pages/SiteLanguages.aspx]]> PROVOCATIVE HEADLINE MEDIUM ARTICLE GOES OVER TWO LINES Sikorsky has authorized Honeywell and our distributors to provide HUMS hardware directly to organizations that operate S-76C++ helicopters. With our HUMS technology onboard, S-76C++ operators have easy access to the information they can use to enhance safety, improve aircraft availability and reduce maintenance costs and maintenance hours. HUMS products collect, process, and interpret data generated by various aircraft systems including rotating and vibrating parts, on the helicopter. FIND OUT MORE <[[#]]> © 2016 Honeywell International Inc. <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=edit me}}. If you don't want to receive these emails from Honeywell in the future you can unsubscribe <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Unsubscribelandingpage.html]]> Terms of Use <[[http://www.honeywell.com/terms-conditions]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://www.honeywell.com/privacy-statement]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]>
